name: Inside To Kill
description:
Inside To Kill is a platformer shooter developed by MrGlowingRed.

Objective: Destroy all orange hearts and destroy all monsters to progress to the next level.

Game mechanic: Jump inside the monster's mouth to enter its inside's and destroy its yellow hearts to kill it. Blue square teleport you around levels.

Things to know: The game rewards you with a screen shake effect when killing a monster or destroying a heart, refrain from playing if you get nauseous easily. The game
